text: Wu Yibing (; ; born 14 October 1999) is a Chinese tennis player. He has become world no.1 in the ITF Juniors ranking after winning boys' singles title of the 2017 US Open. In December 2016, Wu reached the final of the 2016 Orange Bowl, a Grade A junior event, losing to Miomir Kecmanović in the final. Wu represented China at the 2017 Davis Cup, where he has a W/L record of 1–0. He defeated Jason Jung in his first Davis Cup match. In 2017, Wu reached semi- finals in both boys' singles and doubles at the Australian Open, and won both the boys' singles and doubles champions (with Taiwan's Hsu Yu-hsiou) at the US Open, thus became the first Chinese male to win a Grand Slam title.
